mean_cn: n.学院，专科学院，研究院；  vt.建立，设立，制定
mean_en: an organization that has a particular purpose, especially one that is connected with education or a particular profession; the building used by this organization
sentence: A lot of top scientists are working in this Institute of Medical Biology.
sentence_trans: 许多顶尖的科学家在这家医用生物学研究院工作。
word_etyma: in内部 + stitut建立 + e → 建立在内部的 → 学院；制定，设立
